content: <rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"          xmlns:dct="http://purl.org/dc/terms/"          xmlns:skos="http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#"         <skos:hasTopConcept xml:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/borehole_acoustic_images"/>         <skos:hasTopConcept xml:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/borehole_optical_images"/>         <skos:hasTopConcept xml:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/borehole_parameters"/>         <skos:hasTopConcept xml:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/PS_stoneley_velocity"/>         <skos:hasTopConcept xml:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/wireline"/>         <skos:hasTopConcept xml:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/lwd"/>     </skos:ConceptScheme>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/caliper">         <skos:definition>A representation of the measured diameter of a borehole along its depth.</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>caliper</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel>caliper log</skos:altLabel>         <dct:subject rdf:resource="http://brg.ldeo.columbia.edu/services/LogHole/?measurement=caliper"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/density">         <skos:definition>Mass per unit of volume.</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>density</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel>density log</skos:altLabel>         <dct:subject rdf:resource="http://brg.ldeo.columbia.edu/services/LogHole/?measurement=density"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/gamma_ray">         <skos:definition>Total natural radioactivity.</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>gamma_ray</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel>gamma ray log</skos:altLabel>         <dct:subject rdf:resource="http://brg.ldeo.columbia.edu/services/LogHole/?measurement=gamma%20ray"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/geochemistry">         <skos:definition>Elemental concentrations from which the geochemistry of the formation may             be derived.         </skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>geochemistry</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel>geochemical log</skos:altLabel>         <dct:subject rdf:resource="http://brg.ldeo.columbia.edu/services/LogHole/?measurement=geochemistry"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/inclinometry">         <skos:definition>Dip of the Earth's magnetic field.</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>inclinometry</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel>inclinometer log</skos:altLabel>         <dct:subject rdf:resource="http://brg.ldeo.columbia.edu/services/LogHole/?measurement=inclinometry"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/magnetic_field">         <skos:definition>Strength or direction of the Earth's magnetic field.</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>magnetic_field</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel>magnetic field log</skos:altLabel>         <dct:subject rdf:resource="http://brg.ldeo.columbia.edu/services/LogHole/?measurement=magnetic%20field"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/magnetic_susceptibility">         <skos:definition>Degree of magnetization of a formation in response to an applied magnetic             field.         </skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>magnetic_susceptibility</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel>magnetic susceptibility log</skos:altLabel>         <dct:subject                 rdf:resource="http://brg.ldeo.columbia.edu/services/LogHole/?measurement=magnetic%20susceptibility"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/nuclear_magnetic_resonance">         <skos:definition>Nuclear magnetic properties of formation hydrogen.</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>nuclear_magnetic_resonance</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel>nuclear magnetic resonance log</skos:altLabel>         <dct:subject                 rdf:resource="http://brg.ldeo.columbia.edu/services/LogHole/?measurement=nuclear%20magnetic%20resonance"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/porosity">         <skos:definition>Percentage of pore volume or void space, or that volume within rock that             can contain fluids.         </skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>porosity</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel>porosity log</skos:altLabel>         <dct:subject rdf:resource="http://brg.ldeo.columbia.edu/services/LogHole/?measurement=porosity"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/P_velocity">         <skos:definition>Compressional (P) wave velocities.</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>P_velocity</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel>P-wave velocity log</skos:altLabel>         <dct:subject rdf:resource="http://brg.ldeo.columbia.edu/services/LogHole/?measurement=P%20velocity"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/S_velocity">         <skos:definition>Shear (S) wave velocities.</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>S_velocity</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel>S-wave velocity log</skos:altLabel>         <dct:subject rdf:resource="http://brg.ldeo.columbia.edu/services/LogHole/?measurement=S%20velocity"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/Stoneley_velocity">         <skos:definition>Stoneley (tube) wave velocities.</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>Stoneley_velocity</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel>Stoneley-wave velocity log</skos:altLabel>         <dct:subject rdf:resource="http://brg.ldeo.columbia.edu/services/LogHole/?measurement=Stoneley%20velocity"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/resistivity">         <skos:definition>Ability of a material to resist electrical conduction.</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>resistivity</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel>resisitivity log</skos:altLabel>         <dct:subject rdf:resource="http://brg.ldeo.columbia.edu/services/LogHole/?measurement=resistivity"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/spontaneous_potential">         <skos:definition>Naturally occurring (static) electrical potential in the Earth.</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>spontaneous_potential</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel>spontaneous potential log</skos:altLabel>         <dct:subject rdf:resource="http://brg.ldeo.columbia.edu/services/LogHole/?measurement=spontaneous%20potential"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/temperature">         <skos:definition>Temperature and temperature gradient.</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>temperature</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel>temperature log</skos:altLabel>         <dct:subject rdf:resource="http://brg.ldeo.columbia.edu/services/LogHole/?measurement=temperature"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/miscellaneous">         <skos:definition>miscellaneous stuff</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>miscellaneous</skos:prefLabel>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/caliper">         <skos:definition>A caliper tool used in certain measurements</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>caliper</skos:prefLabel>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/borehole_electrical_images">         <skos:definition>Images of the borehole</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>borehole_electrical_images</skos:prefLabel>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/PS_velocity">         <skos:definition>P and S wave velocity</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>PS_velocity</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel>P+S velocity</skos:altLabel>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/borehole_acoustic_images">         <skos:definition>Images of the borehole via sound</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>borehole_acoustic_images</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel>borehole acoustic images</skos:altLabel>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/borehole_parameters">         <skos:definition>A parameter of the borehole</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>borehole_parameters</skos:prefLabel>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/borehole_optical_images">         <skos:definition>Borehole images in optical wavelengths</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>borehole_optical_images</skos:prefLabel>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/PS_stoneley_velocity">         <skos:definition>P and S wave Stoneley velocity</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>PS_stoneley_velocity</skos:prefLabel>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/wireline">         <skos:definition>wireline related</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>wireline</skos:prefLabel>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>        <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/ldeo/lwd">         <skos:definition>Define what LWD is here</skos:definition>         <skos:prefLabel>lwd</skos:prefLabel>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>   </rdf:RDF>
